nodes.bodyText: do we want to raise an illegalargexception if size is < 32?
Probably good to do that here actually. I guess was thinking mikuli will do that check, but not nice relying on mikuli to verify that.
mikuli only does check for size == 48
so it should be ok to leave it as it is.

think it would have been safe as it was, as mikuli will throw. but I like it checking the size in this class.
have added a size check
